Workflow.Name: When Action Type is Detention Notice Ensure Only Type is Selected
Workflow.Description: When creating a Detention Notice, 1 and only 1 of either "Detaining DG not..." or "Detailing MOC not..." fields must be set to yes.

LocalizedName.description: When Action Type is Detention Notice Ensure Only Type is Selected

Description.description: When creating a Detention Notice, 1 and only 1 of either "Detaining DG not..." or "Detailing MOC not..." fields must be set to yes.

label.description: Only one of these options must be selected: either Detaining DG or Detaining MOC.
Une seule de ces options doit être sélectionnée : soit Détention d'une MD ou Détention d'un contenant.
